about_the_game:
Shortly about this game:

This game is about the most fascinating and fabulous thing - Eggplant.Your main and only objective in this game is to click on the eggplant as many times as possible. If you are as amazed by these gorgeous vegetables as we are, then join us and become a fellow Eggplanter!

Features:

  • Egglants
  • Clicking on Eggplants
  • Achievments
  • Eggplant drops
  • Low spec requirements
detailed_description:
Shortly about this game:

This game is about the most fascinating and fabulous thing - Eggplant.Your main and only objective in this game is to click on the eggplant as many times as possible. If you are as amazed by these gorgeous vegetables as we are, then join us and become a fellow Eggplanter!

Features:

  • Egglants
  • Clicking on Eggplants
  • Achievments
  • Eggplant drops
  • Low spec requirements

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.2 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.2 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Eggplant is a simple clicker game where you can relax, click on eggplants, and receive plenty of amazing rewards. Receive Eggplant drops and grow your collection!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
